channel.title: [Delta]Commands Help[Delta]
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I want something unique. I'm sick of having a cluttered Client.java with commands and stuff, I've removed all command and kept the important ones in a seperate folder. I want the server to read the commands from the folder so when someone types the commands it will work but I want it to read the commands from
[b]Server/Commands/(.Java files here).[/b]
How can i modifiy this, I would also like to do it with skills.

item.title: [Delta]Commands Help[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

Do you have msn? I can create a system for you.

Read full topic

I mean, like a completely new folder in the main bit.
